sentences.sContent: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.sCn: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.sContent: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.sCn: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

trans.tranOther: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said
